Member.name: Status
Member.summary: (From XML file) Customer's Status. Valid Statuses are "Active" and "Inactive". The "required" notice is produced by MicroElements.Swashbuckle.FluentValidation from my FluentValidation AbstractValidator.

Member.name: FirstName
Member.summary: (From XML file) Customer's First Name. "maxLength" note in the Schema is produced by DataAttribute on the property.
